page.description: Whenever you create a new UX component in Alpha Anywhere the UX Templates Genie pops up. This genie lets you select one of several pre-defined templates or a template from your own library of templates. Templates can be a great time saver because you can pre-set a multitude of properties whenever you create a new component.

section.description: Some UX templates are specifically geared towards creating mobile apps while others are aimed at quickstarting applications using PhoneGap, panels, or other features. Of course it is always possible to select the "Start with a blank UX component option". Here are some video links relating to the UX Component's template dialog...
